events.message: The customer has submitted the initial claim report following a car accident on the highway last night.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident based on the keywords detected in the customer's initial report.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and assist the claimant with next steps.
Acknowledgement of claim receipt was sent to the customer, expressing understanding and support for their situation.
Request for supporting documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates was made to the customer.
Customer provided all the requested documentation timely, including photos and official accident reports.
Internal investigation began to verify accident details and assess the extent of damage to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was covered under policy terms, with no fault discrepancies found.
A settlement proposal outlining the approved repair costs and compensation was sent to the customer for review and approval.
Customer responded with positive feedback regarding clear communication and timely handling of their claim.
The claim was formally approved based on investigation results and customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the vehicle repairs was successfully transferred to the customerâ€™s account to expedite the restoration process.
The claim was successfully closed after all payments were completed and customer satisfaction was confirmed.
